Text:
Felony's first release was nuked for repeating segments and the REPACK was also nuked for glitches.

This is their third and proper release.
Also has bigger filesize of 6.55 GB compared to 5.45 GB on the previous 2 releases.

Did not know anything about the movie in advance,so for me it was a very good movie.Nick Nolte is brilliant as the father.Yes they are ultimate fighters,but it could have been anything.Its added action,thats why its entertainement;)
